name: Horrorrobot
description:
*JUMPSCARE WARNING*

It's not that scary, just a warning because it exists.

CONTROLS:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Moving around

Space - Interact

A short game made entirely by myself for the Jamboree 2 game jam. You are a robot and a new software update containing "fear" is going around.

Turns out my "putting things to draw in front of other things that should appear behind" system doesn't work very well. Sorry about that.
